content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

alter PROC [dbo].[UpsertLnkClaimDiagnosisCodes] AS
BEGIN

UPDATE diag SET ClaimDiagnosisId = diagStage.ClaimDiagnosisId,
ClaimFormDetailId= diagStage.ClaimFormDetailId,
IcdCodeId= diagStage.IcdCodeId
FROM
LnkClaimDiagnosisCodes diag
JOIN
Load.LnkClaimDiagnosisCodes diagStage ON
diag.ClaimDiagnosisId = diagStage.ClaimDiagnosisId

insert into dbo.LnkClaimDiagnosisCodes (ClaimDiagnosisId,ClaimFormDetailId,IcdCodeId)
SELECT diagStage.ClaimDiagnosisId, 
diagStage.ClaimFormDetailId, 
diagStage.IcdCodeId
FROM
Load.LnkClaimDiagnosisCodes diagStage 
LEFT JOIN 
LnkClaimDiagnosisCodes diag ON diag.ClaimDiagnosisId = diagStage.ClaimDiagnosisId
WHERE diag.IcdCodeId IS NULL

--Insert the log details into Load.LogDetails table
DECLARE @logId INT
SELECT @logId = LogID FROM [Load].[Log] WHERE FileType = 'ClaimDiagnosisCodes' 

INSERT INTO [Load].[LogDetails] (LogId,CompletedDate)
select @logId,  GETDATE()

--update load.Log table
UPDATE [Load].[Log] SET LastUpdatedDate = GETDATE() WHERE FileType = 'ClaimDiagnosisCodes' 



END
GO
